item.title: Scientists say this brain network may explain range of Parkinson's symptoms
item.description: Parkinson's disease can affect sleep, thinking and smell, as well as movement. A new study may explain why.

item.title: Here's how this 87-year-old triathlete keeps her heart strong
item.description: Despite issues with her heart, this octogenarian still competes in triathlons. She's proof that preventive medicine paired with smart lifestyle choice...

item.title: How a Black fossil digger became a superstar in the very white world of paleontology
item.description: In South Africa, paleontology has been dominated by white people. Lazarus Kgasi is changing that dynamic — and coloring in the picture of the world ou...

item.title: GLP-1 obesity drugs can complicate life for people with disordered eating
item.description: Doctors, patients and researchers are at the very beginning of understanding how the new class of obesity drugs interact with eating disorders.

item.title: This global health leader praises Trump's aid plan — and gears up to beat malaria
